list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist, including the palm, fingers, and thumb.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was leading her by the hand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã dẫn dắt cô ấy bằng tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pointer on a clock or watch indicating the passing of units of time.
used in reference to the power to direct something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the day-to-day running of the house was in her hands
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chạy bộ hàng ngày của ngôi nhà nằm trong tay cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person's workmanship, especially in artistic work.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this should be a clue in attributing other work to his hand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đây phải là một manh mối trong việc quy kết các công việc khác với bàn tay của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who engages in manual labor, especially in a factory, on a farm, or on board a ship.
the set of cards dealt to a player in a card game.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy có một bàn tay tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of measurement of a horse's height, equal to 4 inches (10.16 cm).

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bàn tay lốm đốm của chuối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pick (something) up and give it to (someone).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he handed each man a glass
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh trao cho mỗi người đàn ông một ly

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hold the hand of (someone) in order to help them move in the specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he handed him into a carriage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đưa anh vào một cỗ xe
